xep.header:
XMPP Intermediate IM Client 2008 This document defines the XMPP Intermediate IM Client 2008 compliance level. &LEGALNOTICE; 0213 Draft Standards Track Standards
XEP-0211 XEP-0016 XEP-0045 XEP-0054 XEP-0085 XEP-0155
N/A &stpeter;
1.0 2007-07-11 psa
Per a vote of the XMPP Council, advanced to Draft.
0.5 2007-07-11 psa
Added XEP-0155 as recommended.
0.4 2007-06-11 psa
Added implementation notes.
0.3 2007-05-30 psa
Per list discussion, removed XHTML-IM.
0.2 2007-05-11 psa
Per list discussion, modified MUC support, added privacy lists, and added vCard support.
0.1 2007-04-20 psa
Initial published version.
0.0.1 2007-03-30 psa First draft, split from XEP-0117.

section1.p: The &XSF; defines protocol suites for the purpose of compliance testing and software certification. This document specifies the XMPP Intermediate IM Client 2008 certification level.
The XMPP Intermediate IM Client 2008 certification level is defined as follows:

tr.td: &xep0045;, Entity Use Cases and Occupant Use Cases

section1.p: Some of the protocol specifications referenced herein have their own dependencies; developers must refer to the relevant specifications for further information.
This document introduces no additional security considerations above and beyond those defined in the documents on which it depends.
This document requires no interaction with &IANA;.
This document requires no interaction with the ®ISTRAR;.
